ch.codebulb.crudfaces.renderer

Class BootstrapFormLayoutProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.codebulb.crudfaces.renderer.BootstrapFormLayoutProvider

  • public class BootstrapFormLayoutProvider
extends Object
    A class which contains Bootstrap-specific style classes and grid-units to build a form grid within FormLayoutRenderer.
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Nicolas Hofstetter (codebulb.ch)
